entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kouchibouguac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:24 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 2:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: SW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
